thread.title: Great Rooms and Excellent Service
thread.title_full: Great Rooms and Excellent Service - Review of the Quin, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: jacobv906
title: Great Rooms and Excellent Service
text: This was a fantastic hotel stay, the service was pleasant and the facilities were impeccably maintained and absolutely beautiful. I did have a problem in that I lost my photo ID on my way to this hotel, I called the hotel and told them of the problem and we changed the reservation name to my husband's over the phone and at check in I was able to get our room without delay or hassle, I appreciated their flexibility, you will not regret staying here!
